files.index.html: HTML shell with 4setup metadata, mounts React at #app
files.src/main.tsx: React entry point with React Router (Home, Setups, Blog, Contact) and header CTAs
files.src/style.css: Global styles and Tron neon theme: animated grid, scanlines, perspective floor
files.src/assets/misc/background button.png: Background image used on header CTA buttons
files.src/i18n.tsx: Lightweight i18n provider with EN/CZ translations, auto-detect, and selector
